Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: I once glued a set of false teeth to the Boomerang.^${12 39 c7}That came back to bite me.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest
